casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony JOHNSON. No. 210PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2006. L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC. C. Scott Holmes, Durham, for Tony Johnson.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of April 2006 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
